body: So, after something like a month away from avicus, I'm back. Summer has been hectic as crap for me. First off to DC for a week and a half for a school trip. Then 3 days home, and 2.5 weeks in ITALY with my cousins and family. I just got back, and I hope to see most of you on the server. ;)

title: I'm back!
